Title: Enacts the "child care for caregivers act"
Summary: Establishes the regulated child care workforce as a priority population for child care assistance program funds; requires a public education and outreach campaign.
LawCode: Amd ยง410-x, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to enacting the "child care for caregivers act"
